snippet: The chief executive of the electric car company Tesla, Elon Musk, says a battery in a Model S that caught fire this week was apparently impaled by a metal object.
abstract: Tesla chief executive Elon Musk says battery in Model S electric car that caught fire was apparently impaled by metal object, defending automobile's battery technology.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of the electric car company Tesla, Elon Musk, says a battery in a Model S that caught fire this week was apparently impaled by a metal object.

headline.main: Elon Musk Defends Tesla Car After Fire
headline.print_headline: Elon Musk Defends Tesla Car After Fire
